name: Cleanser
directions: Apply a small amount of cleanser onto dampened skin. Gently massage onto skin with a circular motion. Rinse skin thoroughly with water and pat dry. Follow with toner, serum, eye cream, moisturizer, and sunscreen.
skintype: This product is for all skin types.
benefits:
1) Helps to neutralize free radicals.
2) Leaves the skin feeling clean, supple and nourished.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Tilia Cordata (Linden) Flower Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Seed Extract, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Algae Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Matricaria) Flower Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green And White Tea) Leaf Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed)Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Bisabolol, Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5), Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Ceteareth-20, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Sodium Hydroxide, Carbomer, Sodium Phytate, Alpha-Isomethyl-Ionone, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene, Limonene, Coumarin, Eugenol, Linalool, Fragrance (Parfum).

name: Toner
directions: After cleansing, pour a generous amount of toner onto a piece of cotton and wipe face, neck and decollete. Allow toner to dry naturally. Follow with eye cream, serum, moisturizer and sunscreen.
skintype: This product is for sensitive, dry & normal skin types.
benefits:
1) Helps to neutralize free radicals with a powerful antioxidant blend.
2) Combats the visible signs of premature aging.
3)Soothes the skin, leaving it calm and refreshed.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Carbomer, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Extract, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Fruit Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green And White Tea) Leaf Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Hydroxide, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Citral, Limone

name: Scrub
directions: After cleansing, apply a small amount of scrub and add water. Massage in a circular motion concentrating on areas of congestion. Rinse with water and pat dry. Follow with eye cream, serum, moisturizer and sunscreen.
skintype: This product is for all skin types.
benefits:
1) Helps to neutralize free radicals with a powerful antioxidant blend.
2) Combats the visible signs of premature aging.
3) Leaves skin ultra soft, visibly healthy and radiant.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Tilia Cordata (Linden) Flower Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Seed Extract, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Algae Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Matricaria) Flower Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green And White Tea) Leaf Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed)Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Bisabolol, Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5), Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Ceteareth-20, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Sodium Hydroxide, Carbomer, Sodium Phytate, Alpha-Isomethyl-Ionone, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene, Limonene, Coumarin, Eugenol, Linalool, Fragrance (Parfum).

name: Massage Cream
directions: Gentle enough for daily use. Dispense shampoo into the palms and apply to wet hair. Massage into the scalp to create a rich lather and work shampoo through to the ends. Rinse thoroughly and repeat. Follow by applying Clarifying Conditioner to the ends only.
skintype: This product is for all skin types.
benefits:
1) Helps neutralize free radicals with antioxidants.
2) Combats the visible signs of premature aging.
3) Has a refreshing lemon and citrus scent.
4) Leaves hair balanced, enhancing shine and luster.
5) Petrochemical, sulfate and fragrance free.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butylene Glycol, Peg-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran , Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green And White Tea) Leaf Extract, Algae Extract, Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Extract.

name: Refining Brightening Masque
directions: After cleansing, apply a generous amount to the face, neck and décolleté with the fingertips or a soft masque brush. After five to ten minutes, remove all traces of masque with water and pat dry. Follow with Brightening Serum, Brightening Moisturizer and Sunscreen
skintype: This product is for all skin types.
benefits:
1) Brightens the overall tone of the skin
2) Provides a truly radiant skin tone
3) Lifts away dark spots and pigmentation for a more even complexion
4) Antioxidants protect the skin from free radical and environmental damage
5) Exfoliates the skin to promote faster, healthier cell regeneration
6)Penetrates the skin to inhibit the formation of melanin and subsequent dark spots
ingredients:
1) Burberry, mulberry, licorice, and lemon peel extracts - work together to provide a more even skin tone, lift away dark spots and hyper-pigmentation, and provide a more brilliant skin tone
2) Gigawhite - brightening complex that uses numerous botanical extracts to reduce inflammation, tone the skin, kill bacteria, and inhibit the production of melanin that leads to age spots and hyper-pigmentation
3) Retinyl palmitate - antioxidant that protects the skin while also inhibiting dehydration and promoting the skin’s natural regeneration process
4) Vitamin C - antioxidant that protects the skin from free radical and environmental damage while brightening the overall skin tone for a more radiant appearance; also protects the skin from UVA and UVB damage

name: Purifying Mud Masque
directions: After cleansing, apply a generous amount to the face, neck and decollete with the fingertips or a soft masque brush. After five to ten minutes, remove all traces of masque with water and pat dry. Follow with toner, serum, moisturizer and sunscreen.
skintype: This product is for all skin types.
benefits:
1) Soothing botanicals and age-fighting anti-oxidants.
2) Removes dead skin cell and impurities.
3) Leaves skin feeling silky smooth and refreshed.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Kaolin, Butylene Glycol, Stearic Acid, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Shea Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii), Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Cyclomethicone, Allantoin, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Cetyl Esters, Grape Seed (Vitis Vinifera) Oil, Neem (Melia Azadirachta) Oil, Phytantriol, Sunflower (Helianthus Annus) Oil, Lemon (Citrus Medicia Limonum) Oil, Sodium PCA, Gingko Biloba Extract, Comfrey (Symphtutum Officinale) Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Cats Claw (Uncaria Tomentosa) Extract, Grapefruit (Citrus Grandis) Extract, Rose (Rosa Centifolia) Extract, Lavender (Lavandula Angustifolia) Extract, Orange (Citrus Aurantium Dulcis) Extract, Sage (Salvia Officinalis) Extract, Geranium (Geranium Maculatum) Extract, Rosemary (Rosmarinus Officinalis) Extract, Isostearyl Neopentoate, Bisabolol, Comfrey Root (Symphtutum Officinale) Extract, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Butylparaben, Ethylparaben, Titanium Dioxide (CI77891), Zinc Oxide (CI77947).

name: Papaya Masque
directions: Apply to clean skin and allow it to remain for 3 to 10 minutes, depending on skin sensitivity. Rinse with water and pat dry. Follow with toner, serum, moisturizer and sunscreen. Use once or twice weekly in the absence of irritation.
skintype: This product is for all skin types.
benefits:
1) Helps to neutralize free radicals with a powerful antioxidant blend.
2) Combats the visible signs of premature aging.
3) Leaves the skin soft and supple.

name: Pumpkin Masque
directions: Apply to clean skin and allow it to remain for 3 to 10 minutes, depending on skin sensitivity. Rinse with water and pat dry. Follow with toner, serum, moisturizer and sunscreen. Use once or twice weekly in the absence of irritation.
skintype: This product is for dry, normal, combination & oily skin.
benefits:
1) Helps to neutralize free radicals with a powerful antioxidant blend.
2) Combats the visible signs of premature aging.
3) Improves skin elasticity levels.

name: Age Defying Hydrating Masque
directions: First, cleanse the skin with your favorite cleanser.  Then apply a generous amount of Age Defying Hydrating Masque to the surface of the face, neck, and décolleté.  Allow to penetrate the skin for 5-10 minutes before removing it with warm water.  Follow up with a toner, moisturizer, and SPF protection.  Tip - For more intense hydration, apply the Age Defying Hydrating Masque before bed, and remove it in the morning.
skintype: This product is for dry & normal skin types.
benefits:
Showers the skin with rich moisture that lasts.
2) Conditions the skin for a soft, smooth appearance.
3) Nourishes the skin with active ingredients that firm and tone the skin.
4) Increases cellular production of collagen and elastin fora firmer, less wrinkled complexion.
5) Antioxidant protection from free radical and environmental damage.
ingredients:
1) Stero care - patented complex that improves the thickness of the skin by making up for the loss of estrogen that results from menopause
2) Red clover extract - rich in active ingredients that increase the skin’s production of elastic fibers for a firmer, more youthful look
3) Lecithin - humectant that draws water from the environment for lasting hydration; boosts the skin’s natural healing process for faster recovery
4) Kombuchka - from fermented sweet black tea, this vitamin B and acid rich ingredient improves the radiance of the skin, protects it with a antioxidants, and inhibits unhealthy reactions that lead to aging
5) Dermolectine - growth factor that increases cellular production of collagen and elastin for firmer complexion with fewer visible wrinkles
6) Dermolectine - also called glucomannan, this humectant aids in moisturizing the skin and plumping the skin for a youthful luster
7) Sweet almond oil - rich in fatty acids to fortify the skin’s natural barriers and protect the skin

name: Shower Gel
directions: Gently massage a moderate amount over moistened skin with the fingertips or soft sponge. Work into a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly with water and pat dry. Follow with body balm and sun protection.
skintype: This product is for all skin types.
benefits:
1) Helps neutralize free radicals with antioxidants.
2) Combats the visible signs of premature aging.
3) Leaves skin feeling soft and supple.
